name: MI Carousel
author: MI Dexigner Team

sections.description:
• Simple, easy to use interface – perfect for individual users, developers & clients!
  • Create Responsive, SEO-optimized slideshows in seconds
  • Full width slideshow support
  • Free basic support (covering installation issues and theme/plugin conflicts)
  • Fast – only the minimum JavaScript/CSS is included on your page

Shortcode:
[mi-carousel]
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/mi-carousel directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
Activate the plugin through the �Plugins� menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Install MI Carousel as a regular WordPress plugin. Here is different ways to install MI Carousel plugin

Install by Search Plugin
In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
Search MI Carousel
Click to install
Activate the plugin

Install by Upload Plugin
Download the latest version of MI Carousel (.zip file)
In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
Select Upload Plugin
Click on Choose File
Select downloaded mi-logo-slider.zip & click on Install Now button
Activate the plugin

Install Plugin using FTP
Upload mi-carousel folder inside the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Go to WordPress dashboard > Plugins & Activate the MI Carousel

Where can I get support for this plugin?

If you’ve tried all the obvious stuff and it’s still not working please request support on midexiigner@gmail.com or www.midexigner.com visit leave the message
